title: 为什么我用水桶开了个服，朋友加不进去（外网）
author: 失落古城
txt_content:
暑假里，我用水桶开了个服，我想让我朋友加进来，为什么他一直进不来？
server.properties文件的配置如下：
#Minecraft server properties
#Thu Sep 04 21:01:11 CST 2014
generator-settings=
op-permission-level=4
allow-nether=true
level-name=world
enable-query=false
allow-flight=false
server-port=25565
level-type=DEFAULT
enable-rcon=false
force-gamemode=false
level-seed=
server-ip=
max-build-height=256
spawn-npcs=true
white-list=false
spawn-animals=true
texture-pack=
snooper-enabled=true
hardcore=false
online-mode=false
pvp=true
difficulty=1
enable-command-block=true
server-name=Unknown Server
gamemode=0
max-players=20
spawn-monsters=true
view-distance=10
generate-structures=true
spawn-protection=34
motd=A Minecraft Server

{:10_518:}

replies.author: sahdsg
replies.txt_content: 你确定你不是内网?（用了路由器也算

replies.author: 失落古城
replies.txt_content:
sahdsg 发表于 2014-9-8 20:31
你确定你不是内网?（用了路由器也算
我家是CMCC

replies.author: kivv
replies.txt_content: 端口映射 外网好像才行
